metadata.title: CVE-2014-9649 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - negligible
metadata.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the management plugin inRabbitMQ 2.1.0 through 3.4.x before 3.4.1 allows remote attackers to injectarbitrary web script or HTML via the path info to api/, which is notproperly handled in an error message.

criterions.comment: rabbitmq-server: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
